com.github.multi_axis

Class ForecastFunctions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.multi_axis.ForecastFunctions

  • public abstract class ForecastFunctions
extends Object
    Functions that do forecasts, and various methods used in building them.

                                    Stream<A> as)
        Get a 'some'-wrapped maximum from a stream of values or a 'none' if the input stream is empty.
        Parameters:
        ord - The ordering relation used for determining a maximum value.

      • timedValsLeastSquares

        public static Option<F<BigDecimal,BigDecimal>> timedValsLeastSquares(Stream<TimedValue<BigDecimal>> data)
        Returns a 'some'-wrapped linear function fitted into an input stream of TimedValue with least squares error if the input has sufficient data, or a 'none' if it does not.

        public static Option<F<BigDecimal,BigDecimal>> simpleLeastSquares(Stream<BigDecimal> as,
                                                                  Stream<BigDecimal> bs)
        Return a 'some'-wrapped linear function fitted into the data with least squares error if the input has sufficient data, or a 'none' if it does not.

      • covariance

        public static Option<BigDecimal> covariance(Stream<BigDecimal> as,
                                            Stream<BigDecimal> bs)
        Return the 'some'-wrapped covariance of the values in the two streams, or 'none' in case of insufficient data. Values are paired index by index. In case of uneven length, the leftovers at the tail end of the longer stream are ignored.

      • variance

        public static Option<BigDecimal> variance(Stream<BigDecimal> as)
        Return the 'some'-wrapped variance of the values in the stream, or 'none' in case of insufficient data.

      • mean

        public static Option<BigDecimal> mean(Stream<BigDecimal> as)
        Return the 'some'-wrapped mean of the values in the stream or 'none' in case of an empty stream.

      • sum

        public static Option<BigDecimal> sum(Stream<BigDecimal> as)
        Return the 'some'-wrapped sum of the numbers in the stream or 'none' in case of an empty stream.

      • length

        public static <A> BigDecimal length(Stream<A> as)
        Return the length of a stream.
